name: Asteroids Redux
description:
SO WHAT IS THIS?

This was a short school project, and I don't know what to do with it, so here you go.

It was made quite quickly, and it's the first """complete""" game I've made. Thus, it probably has a lot of bugs ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

The game is quite simple:

You shoot to blow up asteroids, and that gives you points. Just like the original. If you run out of lives (Top-Left), you end your run.

It should only work on PC. If it for some reason works on any other platform, I'd be very surprised.

Just don't turn on turbo-mode in the settings.

That should be everything. Enjoy 5 minutes of bare-bones gameplay :D

       * also, music's from here

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sEhhn8-IX04
